scripts.build: npm install --ignore-scripts && bower install && pulp build -- --source-maps --stash --censor-warnings && npm run bundle-cli
scripts.test: npm run build && pulp test && test/test.ts
scripts.postinstall: (cd app && npm install) && (cd cli && npm install) && npm run build
scripts.bundle-cli: mkdir -p cli/dist && pulp browserify --standalone --skip-entry-point > /tmp/bundle.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- /tmp/bundle.js > cli/dist/bundle.js
